mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hc_form_bkh AS "hcFormBkh", a.hc_form_xm AS "hcFormXm", a.hc_form_sfzh AS "hcFormSfzh", a.hc_form_yuwen AS "hcFormYuwen", a.hc_form_shuxue AS "hcFormShuxue", a.hc_form_zonghe AS "hcFormZonghe", a.hc_form_cj AS "hcFormCj", a.hc_form_status AS "hcFormStatus"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rs_student_result( id, hc_form_bkh, hc_form_xm, hc_form_sfzh, hc_form_yuwen, hc_form_shuxue, hc_form_zonghe, hc_form_cj, hc_form_status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hcFormBkh}, #{hcFormXm}, #{hcFormSfzh}, #{hcFormYuwen}, #{hcFormShuxue}, #{hcFormZonghe}, #{hcFormCj}, #{hcFormStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rs_student_result SET hc_form_bkh = #{hcFormBkh}, hc_form_xm = #{hcFormXm}, hc_form_sfzh = #{hcFormSfzh}, hc_form_yuwen = #{hcFormYuwen}, hc_form_shuxue = #{hcFormShuxue}, hc_form_zonghe = #{hcFormZonghe}, hc_form_cj = #{hcFormCj}, hc_form_status = #{hcFormStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
